agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources TIME & DATE: 3:30 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, March 18, 2019 PLACE: 3W.15 CHAIR: Rep. Lyle Larson The committee will meet to consider pending business and the following bills: HB 13 Phelan Relating to flood planning, mitigation, and infrastructure projects; making an appropriation. HJR 4 Phelan Proposing a constitutional amendment providing for the creation of the flood infrastructure fund to assist in the financing of drainage, flood mitigation, and flood control projects.
